interface iStream {

   public abstract printLn(msg : .sht.core.string) : void;

}

class stdout : iStream {

   override printLn(msg : .sht.core.string) : void
   {
      ._osCall(1,msg);
   }

}

abstract program {

   [allow:consoleTarget] 
   private _out : iStream;
   public abstract run(args : .sht.core.array<.sht.core.string>) : void;

}
